name: The Watchmaker [DISSOLVING REALITIES VIETNAM]
description: A frozen snapshots of daily life, just a few weeks before the global pandemic, in the Duan Xong Market in Hanoi. A man talking with a client on the phone, a tiny shop fixing watches. A slice of time captured with 360 cameras and photogrammetry. By RubenFro - Twitter: @Ruben_Fro
